ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] twisting 5, added note
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Indeed...it would be a sum of the whole. But one who twists four (or five, it possible) does not /necessarily/ do other things worse. The statement to
ygData.messageBody:
--- JESSICA_WEBBER@... wrote:
>
> One who twists three may be ROLE playing well, but logically one who twists
> five is, obviously, contributing /more/ to the group. Period. One plus one
> equals two, no matter how embarassing it may be to those with only one.
>
> *** Not necessarily. If by twisting more songs you miss key messages while
> in a group or on a raid, you're a liability to your group, not a
> contributor.

Indeed...it would be a sum of the whole. But one who twists four (or five, it
possible) does not /necessarily/ do other things worse. The statement to
which I was replying was, essentially, that twisting three is as good as
twisting more.

=====
Coffee contains water...so does your pee
